channel.title: architecture on Stuart Blackler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in architecture on Stuart Blackler's Blog

item.title: Architecture Pathway Introduction
item.description: Over the past year or so, I’ve had the pleasure of mentoring people on their software development journeys. Some of those personnel have expressed a desire to pursue the software architect route. As it’s something that I often refer to, I’ve decided to post a mini-pathway to help guide on some of the basics.
